The film features some of the most iconic scenes in cinematic history, including the famous "I am Charles Chaplin" monologue at the end of the film.

If you prefer something slightly different, I would also recommend "The Return of the Living Dead" by Tom Mathews and Beverly Randolph. This horror film from 1985 is a satirical examination of zombie culture and the consequences of allowing certain forms of violence to go unchecked.
